query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `refreshTokens` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `token` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `tenantId` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastUsedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `ipAddress` varchar(45) NULL,
  `userAgent` varchar(500) NULL,
  `revoked` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `revokedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `revokedReason` varchar(255) NULL,
  CONSTRAINT `refreshTokens_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `token_idx` UNIQUE(`token`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VZWkmDdVMGTAoV.53e2061c2123 --database FUrq59UAJ9LE4f7MefV9tg --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `refreshTokens` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `token` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `tenantId` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastUsedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `ipAddress` varchar(45) NULL,
  `userAgent` varchar(500) NULL,
  `revoked` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `revokedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `revokedReason` varchar(255) NULL,
  CONSTRAINT `refreshTokens_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `token_idx` UNIQUE(`token`)
);
